programme.title: Swimming Class
programme.desc: Dunky wants to learn swimming so goes to the lake with a tyre tube with Keet who is helping looking at the swimming manual to tell him how to swim.

programme.title: Down With Flu
programme.desc: Don is down with flu and his sneezes have left the mice sleepless. They take it as their sole responsibility to stop Don’s sneezes by hook or crook! From medicinal ginger tea to ringing up the doctor they try it all to stop the flu.

programme.title: BIG BALL OF PUPA
programme.desc: The ninjas investigate the strange phenomenon of objects disappearing from Peelville streets while Seb deals with a fear of bugs.

programme.title: BADminton
programme.desc: Marco & Polo are playing badminton in the backyard like a sweet family. Then the shuttle cock falls on Cats head as he is about to catch Keet.

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Sleepy Colonel
programme.desc: It is a sleep deprived Colonel and a caring bro Don who would do anything to make his big bro sleep. And there is Larry, Marly and Charly who scream the life out of Colonel. It is a war for a little calm slumber. And the brothers realize that, with the rats around, it is an impossible thing to get.

programme.title: TRING TRING
programme.desc: The days are getting busier at the hotel and the constant running around and hauling plates etc is getting to Sundar. He just wishes he could quickly finish up and snooze the rest of the time. After an especially hectic day of waiting/cleaning, Sundar cant believe his luck when he finds an old busted cycle near the backyard of the Hotel. With a little tinkering (taking parts out), Sundar manages to change it into a unicycle that will help him clean up and wait tables faster. What Sundar doesnt expect is that balancing on a unicycle can be quite a tricky issue he botches up the deliveries badly and Chai Raja orders him to get rid of the unicycle. Sundar does so with a heavy heart but imagine his surprise when the next day morning he wakes up to a familiar bell- its the unicycleits back and Basha is on it. What hurts more is that Chai Raja is encouraging it as Basha on the unicycle is helping amp up the customer flow. Sundar wants his unicycle back not only because he believes it should him getting the applause but also because the nifty Basha is using the unicycle performance as a faade to stealing fritters. Sundar and Basha have a showdown and Sundar getting carried away, performs with such a frenzy that ultimately he crashes the pantry down. The final shot is off Sundar cleaning up the mess wearing the cycle tire as a reluctant garland.

programme.title: Laundry Business
programme.desc: It is laundry day for Don. And the rats are blocking his way from the first step itself. The whole place is a mess. But when Colonel comes in the picture, the war goes to the next level. Thanks to the rats, Don and Colonel now have nothing to wear.

programme.title: Whirlwind
programme.desc: Deedee is sadly whirling the magic wand wondering what to do. But no matter what Nino suggests, Deedee wants to have the magical version of it all, be it baking a cake or even walking. Finally they decide on the giant jumble jigsaw. Inspite of Nino’s efforts to have a non-magic activity, Deedee’s magic seems to be only solution to tackling the over-sized pieces. But the spell literally whips up a storm. Deedee struggles to control the whirlwind, but it whizzes past out of control into the field ahead. The jigsaw pieces fall in place perfectly but the whirlwind hasn’t stopped. The whirlwind becomes so naughty that it snatches Deedee’s magic wand away. The whirlwind wildly knocks down everything in its path and throws out all the things inside Tiggy’s house. Not to mention the letters of postman Charlie. Even though all are shaken up pretty much by the naughty whirlwind, Deedee is encouraged by all her friends to catch it. The whirlwind even plays mischief with the Tika Pila monster and also the Mayor! The Mayor falls with a bump out of the whirlwind, but luckily with Deedee’s wand. They decide to wear-out the whirlwind safely without magic. They come up with a plan and together do their thing. The whirlwind gradually gets tired and so does the magic wear off. Although it messed up the town, all of them have quite a laugh.

programme.title: DAMSEL DISTRESS
programme.desc: Sundar is dusting the shop in the morning just before service when out of a wallet falls an old photo of a pretty girl. Grinning, Sundar shoves it in front of Chai Raja. Chai Raja taken aback at the photo sighs and looks lovelorn for a second- then shoves the wallet and photo out of sight. Sundar is distracted by another of naughty Bashas antics and doesnt think much of it until there is a swish of unusual colour at the door entrance. And there she stands! Chai Rajas old army crush! Chai Raja is at first stunned but surprise turns to shock when she holds out an invitation- for her newly opening snack shop, right next door. Chai Raja starts sweating and Sundar understands the cause for her consternation soon enough when the next day Chaha Devi (what she calls herself) opens her stand. Its a runaway hit! She is a Bharatnatyam dancer and cooks a meaner batch of fries than Chai Raja dancing bharatnatyam while she cooks so good that not only Chai Rajas clientele is wooed away, but so is Basha! There starts a hilarious and amusing dance off between Chai Raja and Chaha Devi. Chai raja is torn between anger and admiration and its all left to Sundar to salvage Hotel Californias future..and for that may need Bashas help!

programme.title: Moo-Ing Trouble!
programme.desc: Help! There is a cow in the bathroom this time, and he is on a mad eating spree, happily mooing away soap bubbles too!Don & Colonel try in vain to get rid of the cow but the three mice seem to have a different agenda. To make matters worse, a bull has made its grand entry into the scene too

programme.title: MeetZonicornEne
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Cuppa Chase
programme.desc: Don is pouring HOT TEA into his cup from a kettle.He takes the cup and sits down at the table.OPENS the newspaper and begins to read. But as he raises the cup for a sip, all the tea is gone. Its Don chasing the mice all the way, in hopes to have a peaceful tea break!

programme.title: Golden Eggs
programme.desc: Hoodie has his eyes on the hens eggs in GrandPAs farm. Keet has saved them once but is sure Hoodie will try again.

programme.title: MILKY MESS
programme.desc: Business is brisk and Chai Raja frets as the milkman has not arrived and he is almost all out of milk. Sundar gets a so called brain-wave and lures in a genial cow from the not distant yard to help restore supply. Chai Raja is favourably impressed but then equally depressed when following the cow, enters a pugnacious bull not all happy with Sundar for wooing away his girlfriend. Its manic mayhem as the bull chases Sundar around the tea-shop, lent a generous helping hand by Basha who seems to know every trick in the book to drive the bull berserk and Sundar barking mad.

programme.title: BirthDay Party
programme.desc: Its GrandPAs birthday and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house while Dunky is planning to make a nice cake for the evening party.

programme.title: FLYING TEA
programme.desc: The food inspector in in the hotel for an inspection. Juicy jalebis are being fried in the shop and a housefly comes to munch on them. Food inspector is angry and says a fly is a big NO NO. Chai Raja looks at Sundar angrily. Sundar whacks the fly with his towel and throws him out. The defeated fly sadly flies out of the shop, only to be seen by Basha who inspires him, teams up with him and decide to attack the teashop. The duo wreaks havoc in the teashop with tea flying all over the place and jalebis getting thrown all over and the customers going mad with the menacing fly. And the food inspector is visiting again and again to check the cleanliness. Chai Raja is going crazy and he knows that this is all due to Sundars fault. And now poor Sundar has two enemies Basha and the fly! Plus the strict food inspector! Oh o!!!

programme.title: Ant Attack!
programme.desc: It is a usual day in the house with the war between the dogs and the rats. And there is a new group. In fact an army of enemies – ants! And they make the life in the house a living hell. For the first time Don , Colonel and the rat trio get a real taste of the bad ants.

programme.title: Meet Zoonicorn
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: A Slice Of Fun
programme.desc: Ding Dong. It’s the pizza delivery boy. Don pays the cash and open’s the box to find only leftover olives and baby corn! Sad and dejected, he decides to make his own pizza, but is tricked by Lary Marly and Charly as always!

programme.title: Bored
programme.desc: Kala is bored, and Gummy and Harry’s attempts to snap her out of it wind up having unexpected results.

programme.title: COMMANDO KAPPA
programme.desc: Chai Raja cycles in with a fresh batch of bananas when heavy army boots crunch in stomping at the door of the hotel. Chai Raja looks up and is not one jot happy to see his bossy estranged uncle Commando Kappa. Commando Kappa is a bossy man who wants to take over the hotel from Chai Raja and is zany enough to try any underhanded trick . Sundar senses this animosity and wants Kappa out of the shop but 6 and a half foot , Arnold like built Commando Kappa is a tough man to cross. Because he is no great cook, Kappa uses his army tactics to sabotage and tries messing up Chai Rajas ingredients- he switches the ingredients for the tea, Chai Raja knives suddenly go missing etc- Chai Raja however is quick at adapting and when knives go missing he merely uses his moustache to chop the bananas! Sunder too does his best to foil Kappa. and save Chai Raja- like when Kappa accidentally spills oil intending to slip up Chai Raja, Sundar rather himself skid in and break his own bones just so Chai Raja doesnt step into the oil or guzzle up all the chilli-spiced tea (thanks to Kappa dropping chilli powder into the brew on the sly) before Chai Raja serves it to customers and loses his reputation. However the curious Basha keeps poking his naughty nose in and its difficult for Sundar to keep up with Kappas ploys. Kappa tries to finally seize up the flexible Chai Raja, by offering a tampered herbal oil to limber him up (the oil actually stiffens whatever it is poured on- can demonstrate the effect when Kappa does a test on a small sapling on the sill). But just then Sundar and Basha tumble in as part of their chase and the oil flies landing on Kappa gets all seized up and stiff. The cricked Kappa gives up and is shown the door and Basha gives him a 21- banana peel sendoff. But Sundar has no time to rejoice for Basha is again sneaking up to the fries and must be stopped.

programme.title: COWBUAAY CHAI
programme.desc: There is a harvest festival and Chai Raja expects extra business. Sundar is awed by the grand floats and dressed up cattle but what seems to be the star attraction is a cattle wrangler who dressed in fancy gear shows off his talent at lassoing. Sundar manages to cajole a lasso out of the performer but is pathetic he just ends up breaking stuff around the shop. An irate Chai Raja snatches the lasso and chucks it away warning Sundar to keep away from it. But the naughty Basha having overheard the exchange snatches up the discarded lasso. He tries a few flicks and thanks to his circus bent of character is able to master it. The thrilled Basha now sets about framing poor Sundar- he wrecks, snatches away fries and disrupts work about the shop with the lasso and Chai Raja believes its Sundar who does it. Sundar must now quickly rein the situation before he gets the proverbial boot.

programme.title: BIG BUNNY
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to prepare a big feast. Pai sees this as his chance to impress the Elders and earn a new weapon to replace his Mystic Stick. But when he goes to collect the rare striped carrot (a crucial ingredient for his dish), he’s attacked by a Giant Bunny Mutant sent by Negu. His Mystic Stick helps him defeat the Mutant, so he’s content with his weapon…for now.

programme.title: Under the Bridge
programme.desc: Trolly Troll arrives in Smightyland, but her big size scares everyone except Leila. Leila befriends the gentle giant and when Sneevil creates his Mecha-Sneevil Machine and tries to destroy everything, its Trolly Trolls bigness that helps save the day.

programme.title: Bobby's Day Out
programme.desc: The loose motion has caught on to Cat, when he agrees to babysit his neighboring cat Katreena’s neice for the afternoon.

programme.title: Game On
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Tota Raja
programme.desc: Chai Raja adopts a parrot (without a cage) who suddenly considers himself master of the cafe. Sundar now has to take orders from the parrot, who assumes the role of Chai Rajas second-in-command. Sundar detests the parrot but has to take good care of him to make Chai Raja happy. Basha decides to take advantage. He drops water on the parrot and the blame falls on Sundar. The parrot makes Sundars life miserable and Basha too gets caught in the parrots wrath. Sundar and Basha team up and find a way to make Chai Raja fire the parrot.

programme.title: Drive On
programme.desc: They are both wearing goggles, and Lucky sports a scarf too. Buzz waves a checkered flag and theyre off! Buck and Lucky are wide eyed as they start zigzagging past the book racks, screaming, sliding around corners, and driving on 2 wheels.They spin the tires and speed off again, only to find Finkle dead ahead with his mop.They spin the tires and speed off again, only to find Finkle dead ahead with his mop.They drive around her in circles making her spin. As she stands there dizzy they head straight for her desk.

programme.title: The Macaroni Plant
programme.desc: Gummy is determined to grow his favourite food – even if macaroni plants don’t exist!

programme.title: The Speed record
programme.desc: MewMew has a new stopwatch and wants to time everything that everyone does, to get to them to do it at record speed. Life in Abra-Dabra becomes intolerable as everyone tries to be quicker than the next person. Eventually Deedee and the others persuade MewMew to break all his speed records. When he achieves it no one applauds him, so MewMew realises that many things are better done in their own sweet time. He also realises that by doing everything fast, he is missing out on enjoying many things.

programme.title: The New Otter In Town
programme.desc: After thinking that his mother doesnt know what its like to be a kid, in the Zooniverse, Pancake becomes friends with a fun otter kid - who turns out to be his mom!. Judging people/People are often more than what they seem

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: To complete the next step on her Mondojitsu Path, April has to master the dance of the falcon. Since Xia won’t help because he’s too embarrassed to dance with her, April accepts the assistance of Mei, who turns out to be a great dancer. While they’re distracted, Negu sends Amkko and Koto to steal the Glove of the North, but Mei, who feels appreciated for the first time in his life, helps April to win it back.

programme.title: The Old Car
programme.desc: GrandPA wants to go out of town to visit his son, But the whole car has just collapsed and fallen apart . So tells Dunky to service his car and get it ready for him by the evening as he is resting in his room.

programme.title: Bottle Cap
programme.desc: Small yet that doesnt stop our DIY geniuses from coming up with something fun

programme.title: Treehouse Dreams
programme.desc: Odessa designs her own treehouse, but obstacles like no tree get in her way. With a little inspiration from the Zoonicorns, she still finds a way to make her dreams come true. Odessa learns to deal with setbacks in a positive way by being creative and rethinking things, then having the persistence to follow through.

programme.title: A Fishy Chase
programme.desc: Something is fishy in the air! Its Don’s new pet, a Goldfish. Charly Marly and Lary are drooling in hopes of feasting it, but not till Don is there to rescue it.

programme.title: Robot Maid
programme.desc: GrandPA gets a big courier box at his doorstep voila ! it’s a robot maid and she is very efficient in the house within minutes she sparkles the house.

programme.title: Everyone's good at something
programme.desc: The twins meet a little Snowgirl who lacks self-esteem but they help her discover a hidden skill which makes her the hit of the ‘North Pole’s Got Talent’ competition.

programme.title: Dunky Doll
programme.desc: Hoodie the crow is really upset with Dunky as he is so loyal that GrandPAs house & is the only house were he cannot steal anything.

programme.title: Lunch Munch
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting and Dunky has to make a lavish lunch.

programme.title: Bobby's Day Out
programme.desc: The loose motion has caught on to Cat, when he agrees to babysit his neighboring cat Katreena’s neice for the afternoon.

programme.title: This Is Speed Racer
programme.desc: The kids use the Mach 6 time machine to travel back in time to change their bleak future. They see the origins of the time travel car, their parents, and the rise of the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: The Gigantic Turnip
programme.desc: A gigantic turnip grows in the fields of the peasant GoGo grandpa. He tries to pull out an enormous, heavy turnip with the help of grandma, cats, and mice.

programme.title: Honor Code
programme.desc: Speed and the gang discover that the Mach 6s mysterious jump capability is actually related to Time Travel. Meanwhile the Shadowy Org. is remotely using a device to affect Speeds control over the Mach 6s jumps. Speed realizes this device is what controls the cars ability to jump through time and that it could be the missing part of the Mach 6 engine. They discover that when the parts are combined, the Mach 6 will be a fully functional time machine.

programme.title: Playmates
programme.desc: A peaceful day. Don is watering his plants and suddenly the water stops. He jerks the hose, pokes a stick into it, but doesn’t realize that it’s the mice who are causing this water explosion! Don has to take revenge, and this time he sits on his couch with a bunch of fire crackers! Will he set the house on fire?

programme.title: Catch That Bird
programme.desc: Don has adopted a baby pigeon, but can he save it from 5 grumbling tummies? The three mice, Balu and Colonel are adamant on having baby pigeon pie and a mighty havoc ensues. But the kin & kith of the little pigeon have other plans and you have to watch to find out who ultimately ends up on the stove!

programme.title: Lucky Charm
programme.desc: Gummy acquires what he thinks is a lucky charm – and soon becomes foolishly fearless, thinking his ‘good luck’ will protect him.

programme.title: The tale of a toad
programme.desc: The twins help a toad who is rejected because he is so ugly.

programme.title: Super Fun Color Run
programme.desc: Sneevil tries to sabotage the Smighties annual Colour Festival by cementing the competing Smighties with his newest contraption. The Super Six must get colorfully creative to stop him.

programme.title: Kites Away!
programme.desc: It all happens for a kite! Don wants it… the rats wont let it go. And in this tug of war, an angry and frustrated King Chomp is funnily pulled into. It is a bad time for the rats and a very bad time for Don and Colonel.

programme.title: A Fishy Chase
programme.desc: Something is fishy in the air! Its Don’s new pet, a Goldfish. Charly Marly and Lary are drooling in hopes of feasting it, but not till Don is there to rescue it.

programme.title: I want To Ride The Sled
programme.desc: Duda visits Scot who is busy with his snow sleigh. Duda wants to take a ride on the sleigh but Scot refuses to share. So Duda makes his own sled and takes it on his next expedition with Dada, Caber, and Bubble. However, due to Dudas antics, Pinkar crashes and they end up stranded in a hot desert with a flat tire and an empty gas tank. Back in the Unknown Forest, Piggy, Puggy and Scot decide to go after them so Scot can show off his awesome sleigh. Meanwhile, Duda and his friends take turns riding his sleigh. After watching Duda ride his sleigh in the sand, Dada gets the idea and needs nothing more than Scots help to get home. Will the friends be able to escape the desert safely?

programme.title: Hiccup! Hiccup!
programme.desc: Scot tries to surprise Duda when he hears Duda approaching, but Duda ends up scaring Scot. Sudden fear gives Scot hiccups. Bubbles tells Doubt that if he cant stop having hiccups before the sun sets, then hell have hiccups forever. Thinking the hiccups are cool, Duda rushes to tell Scot the "good" news. However, the "good" news makes Scot desperate to get rid of his hiccups quickly. He tries every trick in the book, but nothing seems to work. Feeling dejected, Scot becomes kind and lets Duda have his precious Scottie Buddy. However, when he sees Duda driving recklessly, Scot rushes after him. After ending up at the lake, Scot notices that his hiccups have disappeared. Doubt, on the other hand...

programme.title: A Whole New Ballgame
programme.desc: The Moon in the Zooniverse has fallen from the sky and Odessa and the Zoonicorns must get it back to where it belongs. Sharing can be fun. Never give up.

programme.title: Fred Gets Crushed
programme.desc: Fred thinks Brains is acting strangely, and decides it’s because she has a secret crush on his best friend Sir Percival. Fred secretly spies on them to learn their secret, only to embarrass himself in the process.

programme.title: Wait For Me, Star
programme.desc: After a disappointing day of fishing, the forest friends look at the twinkling stars that have risen in the night. Dada tells them that if you wish on a shooting star, then your wish will come true. Before going to bed, Duda and Scot see a shooting star. But the star falls before they can make their wish. So they separately decide to go look for the fallen star, and end up meeting in the forest. While searching together, they discover some fireflies and mistakenly think they are stars. In a mad race to catch one of them, they end up falling on a cliff ledge. But before they have time to get scared, they notice a shooting star, and finally get to make a wish. Eventually, Dada comes to their rescue, and Duda and Scot return home safely. What do you think Duda and Scot wanted? Do you think his wishes came true?

programme.title: Rose Trick
programme.desc: Dunky is taking special care of a beautiful red rose in his garden which he plans to give it to his girlfriend in the evening. And has just stopped Cat from almost ruining it.

programme.title: Much to Your Surprise
programme.desc: When Maple ruins a surprise meant for Pancake, she finds out in the Zooniverse that surprises are only surprising when they are surprises. Seeing things from other people’s points of view can make things easier to understand.

programme.title: Magic Shoes
programme.desc: One day a frustrated Don get a wonderful gift – a pair of magic shoes. He is all too excited to try the new weapons. But the rats make him realize that the gift is in fact a curse. Don is not ready to give up, and at last he turns out to be street smart and succeeds in throwing his arch rivals out of his house – for the first time. But how???

programme.title: The Dung Beatle
programme.desc: To make herself more likable to the other girls at school, Fred arranges for Braianna to throw a “Pet Party,” with Friday posing as her doggy.

programme.title: LOVE IS BLIND
programme.desc: Fulfilling the Elders’ assignment to wrangle clouds, Pai falls in love with a rodent girl named Lol. But Lol proves to be one of Negu’s mutants, intent on stealing the Glove of the North.

programme.title: The Great Manfredi – The Bremen Town Musicians
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, FO, travel into the famous tale by the Brothers Grimm, “THE BREMEN TOWN MUSICIANS“, having been called out by the MANAGER of that city’s theatre. Finally, the four musical animals are about to achieve their great dream: to perform in the Bremen Grand Theatre. But a mysterious, dangerous ghost seems to want to prevent this. The fairytale detective and her elf assistant unravel the mystery and confront the Great Manfredi, a cunning magician and illusionist.

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A notorious robber has come to rob GrandPA’s house. He has with him a fancy paint and brush which can makes him blend seamlessly into anything.

programme.title: The Contest
programme.desc: Rich eccentric Grumpy McCrab launches a contest with a huge prize for whoever can go longest without laughing, smiling, singing or dancing. Miraculously, Gummy winds up among the finalists..

programme.title: The 22.30 Express – Little Red Riding Hood Case 2
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the story of LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD, having been called out by her and her GRANDMOTHER. When the detective and her assistant arrive, they discover that it has been a year since the FEROCIOUS WOLF unsuccessfully tried to eat LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD and her GRANDMOTHER. Since then, the FEROCIOUS WOLF has been in jail, while LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD and her GRANDMOTHER became the most popular and best-loved people in the community. Everything changed a week ago, when a series of mysterious crimes began in the village and the surrounding area. Everything would seem to indicate that these were committed by LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD and her GRANDMOTHER, who all the villagers now hate. SANDRA and FO must find the real culprit, to demonstrate the innocence of LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD and her sweet GRANDMOTHER

programme.title: Don In Pain
programme.desc: Don happens to eat a ‘metallic hot dog’ which gave him a bad tooth. Now he wants it removed. Colonel tries everything possible. Even the rats come to offer their ‘help’. But that tooth just refuses to leave his mouth. At last, they are at the dentist’s and it is all funny and hilarious!

programme.title: The New Fred
programme.desc: After Fred clumsily insults Nora, he commands Friday to do his talking for him, transforming into a neck piece Fred wears, imitating his voice, and giving him a shock when he tries to speak for himself. Friday’s bold personality rehabilitates Fred’s reputation, until he short circuits and starts insulting everyone.

programme.title: BADminton
programme.desc: Marco & Polo are playing badminton in the backyard like a sweet family. Then the shuttle cock falls on Cats head as he is about to catch Keet.

programme.title: Avalon Island - King Arthur
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO are called out by King Arthur, who is still a young boy. His tutor, MERLIN, has mysteriously disappeared, along with the sword EXCALIBUR, and the election of the new king of England is to take place the very next day. Soon, SANDRA will discover that the culprit is the fairy MORGANA. SANDRA and FO set off for the isle of Avalon, where she lives, to battle against her powerful magic and rescue both the mythical sword and the great wizard.

programme.title: Un amor (casi) perfecto
programme.desc: Julie tiene 36, está sin trabajo y soltera, así que ha decidido tomar las riendas de su destino.

programme.title: Un amor (casi) perfecto
programme.desc: Julie tiene un plan para conquistar el corazón de Max, el hombre de sus sueños al que todavía no conoce.

programme.title: Un amor (casi) perfecto
programme.desc: Julie debe elegir entre una historia de amor real y una historia de un hipotético amor ideal.

programme.title: Un amor (casi) perfecto
programme.desc: Max y Julie pasaron la noche juntos y fue maravilloso, pero después se encuentran a la mujer que él ama.

programme.title: Un amor (casi) perfecto
programme.desc: Stéphane se ve despampanante en la foto del calendario del club de rugby. Ava intenta recuperar a sus hijos.

programme.title: SuperDad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Aladdin(Mel-O-Toons) 1960
programme.desc: In this adaptation of the Arabian Nights tale, poor Aladdin discovers a magic lamp containing a genie who grants his wish to marry a princess.

programme.title: Taxi Turvy 1945
programme.desc: On the outside of an office building, Popeye and Bluto duke it out as rival window washers.

programme.title: Plane Dumb-1932
programme.desc: After crash landing in Africa, Tom and Jerry masquerade as Africans in a futile attempt to adapt to a strange environment.

programme.title: Gold Rush Daze 1939
programme.desc: A man stops for gas on his way to dig for gold. The man at the station tells him what it was like back in 1849 in San Francisco, which we see. A sucker is hauled off the street and sat down at a card game; he dashes off as soon as someone shouts "they found gold in the hills" but others stake claims before he can. He ends up chopping off a cliff, falling down, and landing in the hospital. The doctor gives him news of another gold strike and he rushes out to begin panning. After some more mining gags and a song, we see a montage of more failed gold strikes. Back to the present day, where the storyteller claims to have sworn off gold, until a rider passes through with news of another strike, when he trades the station for the car and sets out after the gold.

programme.title: Secret Agent 1943
programme.desc: Superman battles saboteurs determined to stop a lady double agent from getting important documents to Washington D.C.

programme.title: Cad and Caddy- 1947
programme.desc: Lulu plans her revenge against a distressed golfer who refuses to give her a lollipop after he promised her one for caddieing for him

programme.title: My Favorite Duck 1942
programme.desc: Porky tries to relax on a hunting and fishing trip, but Daffy, smugly pointing out the "No Duck Hunting" signs, subjects him to constant irritation. Then the "Duck Hunting Season Open" signs start going up.

programme.title: Tulips Shall Grow 1942 (madcap models no. u1-5)
programme.desc: A carefree boy and a young girl find their idyllic countryside invaded by an army of mindlessly destructive robots.

programme.title: Spree Lunch 1957
programme.desc: Popeye opens a diner; Bluto pulls one up right across the street. Wimpy comes along, and they compete for his business. The competition escalates, until finally they are throwing things at each other; Wimpy stands between them and snags a complete meal from the stream of objects passing overhead. Another spinach-free Popeye.

programme.title: It's Hummer Time 1950
programme.desc: A cat chases a hummingbird and repeatedly stumbles onto the property of a sleepy bulldog, who punishes the cat for each interruption of his slumber.

programme.title: Superman: Eleventh Hour- 1942
programme.desc: While Clark Kent is in wartime Japan, Superman becomes a saboteur.

programme.title: Betty Boop- Baby Be Good-1935
programme.desc: Betty Boop tells naughty Little Jimmy a corrective fairy tale (with herself as fairy). Part of the action is replayed in reverse.

programme.title: Barnacle Bill 1930
programme.desc: Sailor Bimbo (as Barnacle Bill) jumps ship with his little black book and visits his lady friend, Betty Boop (with dog's ears).

programme.title: Spooky Swabs 1957
programme.desc: Popeye and Olive are shipwrecked; they think they are saved when they see a ship, but what they don't realize is that the crew of the Sea Witch is all ghosts, and soon they are under attack, but they don't know from what for a while

programme.title: Customers Wanted 1939
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto compete in their penny arcades for Wimpy's business

programme.title: Now Hear This 1962
programme.desc: In this very abstract cartoon, a hard-of-hearing old Britisher finds a red horn and uses it as a megaphone, unaware that it is really a lost horn from the Devil's forehead. The Britisher finds that the horn has the effect of amplifying every sound psychedelically and causing him serious bodily harm

programme.title: Me Musical Nephews 1942
programme.desc: Popeye's nephews have been practicing their music and are getting good, but it's bedtime. After Popeye puts them to bed, they discover that many of the things in their bedroom can also be used to make music. And they are also blessed with an uncanny ability to appear to sleep every time Popeye comes to check on them

programme.title: Aladdin and His Wonderful Lamp- 1939
programme.desc: Working in the story department of Surprise Pictures, Olive Oyl writes a script based on the story of Aladdin, casting Popeye as the thief and herself as the Princess

programme.title: Insect to Injury 1956
programme.desc: Popeye tries to get rid of termites before they ruin his newly built house.

programme.title: Small Fry-1939
programme.desc: Junior wants to be a Big Fry, but learns the hard way that he just isn't ready for smoking in the pool room when he should be in the school room.

programme.title: The Trojan Horse 1960
programme.desc: During the Trojan War, the Greeks build a giant wooden horse as a stratagem to conquer the city of Troy. Adapted from the Greek myth.

programme.title: Robinhood Makes Good 1939
programme.desc: Three little squirrels act out the story of Robin Hood. A fox, thinking he can make a meal out of them, joins in. The squirrels have to find a way to get rid of the fox.

programme.title: Big Bad Sindbad 1952
programme.desc: Popeye tells his nephews about the time he walloped Sinbad, the *second* greatest sailor who ever lived

programme.title: The Goat 1921
programme.desc: A series of adventures begins when an accident during photographing causes Buster to be mistaken for Dead Shot Dan, the local bad guy.

programme.title: Smart Alecks-1942
programme.desc: Danny comes into money for capturing an elusive criminal - money which Mugs insists he split equally with the gang while gangsters want to split open Danny.

programme.title: Back Stage-1923
programme.desc: The gang operates a donkey-propelled tour bus. Later, a cut-rate vaudeville producer hires them to help out with his show, which they wreck.

programme.title: Caught in a Cabaret 1914
programme.desc: Charlie is a clumsy waiter in a cheap cabaret and must endure the strict orders from his boss. He meets a pretty girl in the park and pretends to be a fancy ambassador but must contend with the jealousy of her fiancé.

programme.title: The General 1926
programme.desc: After being rejected by the Confederate military, not realizing it was due to his crucial civilian role, an engineer must single-handedly recapture his beloved locomotive after it is seized by Union spies and return it through enemy lines

programme.title: Guest Raquel Willis
programme.desc: Raquel Willis is a major trans activist and the author of a powerful memoir called The Risk It Takes To Bloom. We dive deep into what it means to be trans from her coming out to her politics to her dating life. Amazing conversation.

programme.title: The Crew talks New Year Resolutions, Rihanna, the Super Bowl, and More
programme.desc: Starr Rocque and Yonathan Elias kick off the year sharing some of their goals and covering the hottest pop culture news, from the Grammys and the Oscars to Rihanna and the Super Bowl and everything in between.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a daily video message encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Guest Don Cheadle
programme.desc: Don Cheadle is the man. Incredible actor, deep thinker. I love hearing him talk about acting.

programme.title: Guest Diamond D
programme.desc: Diamond D is a Hip-Hop legend. Rapper, producer, and lover of the culture. I love talking the people who help create the culture every day.

programme.title: Alfredo
programme.desc: Brendan Cobbs, un famoso novelista, es enviado a una remota cabaña de la Inglaterra rural en busca de inspiración para su próxima novela. Cree haber encontrado su próximo tema cuando se encuentra con Alfred, un muñeco del tamaño de un niño que puede cobrar vida. Pero surgen consecuencias mortales cuando Brendan se da cuenta de que Alfred tiene intención de matar.

programme.title: Hotel Dinosaurio
programme.desc: Sienna está desesperada por ganar un gran premio en metálico en un concurso secreto clandestino, pero los dinosaurios comienzan a cazarla para entretenimiento de los ricos y adinerados. ¿Podrá ser la última en sobrevivir a la horrible noche para ganar el premio?

programme.title: Kecksburg
programme.desc: Un reportero investiga un misterioso accidente y descubre algo más que un objeto, sino una enorme conspiración gubernamental. Inspirada en los hechos reales del 9 de diciembre de 1965 y en uno de los incidentes OVNI más misteriosos de Estados Unidos...

programme.title: Calvario "El Bien y El Mal"
programme.desc: En esta vida hay dos modos de vivir, el del bien y el del mal, paralelo y horizontal, esta historia llena de drama, acción y suspenso nos lleva a estos dos lados casi siempre elegimos voluntariamente pero en un conflicto entre la vida y la muerte y por salvar la vida llegas a traicionar a tu mejor amigo sin saber que la vida da vueltas.

programme.title: Atrapados en Michoacan/Cabron y Vago 2
programme.desc: Las aventuras de Felix y su ahora amigo inseparable el "marrano", quienes se dirigen a Michoacan a hacer negocios y recoger una carga muy valiosa. Pero como si fueran un iman de problemas, se meten en cada lio del que solo con su habilidad con las armas y con sus puños, podran salir adelante. Sin faltar tambien el romance.

programme.title: A Ellas Les Gustan Mayores
programme.desc: Ricardo Soto está casado con Miranda Robles, una mujer guapa con una afortunada posición social. Su esposo aprovechará esta situación para ponerle el cuerno con una jovencita mucho menor que él, sin recordar que el que ríe al último, ríe mejor

programme.title: Crónicas Chilangas
programme.desc: El Jairo, un joven esquizofrénico, cree en seres extraterrestres y siente que debe luchar contra ellos. Claudia es una mujer con sobrepeso que tiene una fuerte debilidad por la pornografía, hecho que la lleva a una serie de conflictos. Por último, está Juvencio, un viejo profesor jubilado cuya mayor preocupación es su hija tetrapléjica, cuyo futuro sin su ayuda o la de su esposa Anita le preocupa mucho. Los caminos de estos tres personajes se enredan cada vez más.

programme.title: Ámbar "El Color de la Familia Perfecta"
programme.desc: Paúl, actor y cantante, propietario de un bar musical, regresa de Canadá para luchar el régimen de visitas a fin de ver crecer a su hijo, Amanda, lo ha alejado por más de 7 años, luego de que ésta lo descubriese con otro hombre en su propia casa…

programme.title: Escape En Vivo
programme.desc: Un investigador paranormal descubre una tierra de nadie infernal en un remoto y olvidado paisaje desértico donde payasos malvados esperan en un purgatorio sobrenatural para enfrentar su destino como venganza por sus malas acciones.

programme.title: Reto Sangriento
programme.desc: Dos jóvenes investigadores de fenómenos paranormales reciben el reto de pasar un fin de semana en una casa donde habitan seres malignos. Esto con el fin de presentar las evidencias en su programa de televisión y levantar el rating, pero lo que no saben es que el reto les costara muy caro.

programme.title: El Beso Inmortal: La Reina De La Noche
programme.desc: Las vacaciones italianas de dos universitarias chocan con un antiguo ritual. Pero a veces los rezos se convierten en cazadores.

programme.title: Dig Until God Does
programme.desc: It will flow when it’s supposed to. In “Dig Until God Does,” Pastor Steven Furtick shows us how to plant seeds of faith in the dry seasons of our lives until God brings the rain.

programme.title: I'm Going Through But I'm Running Over
programme.desc: Don’t lose heart. In “I’m Going Through But I’m Running Over,” Pastor Steven reveals that even though you may face adversity, God is with you — and He’s making a way through.

programme.title: Concealed But Not Canceled
programme.desc: As we celebrate our 18-year anniversary, Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us in “Concealed But Not Canceled” that God can turn our greatest weakness into His greatest weapon.

programme.title: Rags To Righteous
programme.desc: There’s more God wants to do through you. In “Rags to Righteous!” Pastor Steven Furtick explains that God has a plan for every pit stop on the way to your purpose.
